p: Sequence assembly and editing were performed using CodonCode Aligner® (version 3.7.1, CodonCode Corporation, MA) and ClustalX® (version 2.1, Conway Institute UCD Dublin, Ireland). Deduced amino acid sequences were determined using Bioedit® software package version 7.1.3.0 [ 35]. Confirmation of identity and homology were performed using BLAST http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov.
